title: Workshop on Utilizing Virtual Reality-Based Language Education Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in using foundational digital tools
context.additional_context: Acquiring language education methods using virtual reality tools in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Participants can design language learning activities using virtual reality tools.
Participants can explain the impact of VR-based educational tools on improving learners' attention and decision-making skills.
Participants can demonstrate how to effectively operate VR educational tools in a limited technological environment (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
